page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: In Loxley there are two estates of new houses, mainly detached but there is a mix of bungalows and some semi_detached as well. Near the school there is an estate of brick built detached houses about 12 years old. They are joined by their garages. At the other side of the school there are bungalows for old people with a warden, brick built flats which were built about 1980, old terraced and new town houses, semi_detached old and new.Some old ones were built about 1900. Some are council houses and some are privately owned. Most of the houses have fairly large gardens. There are a number of older stone built houses in the area.
